titles.title: Accurate Labeling of Menstrual Products Act of 2016
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the label on certain menstrual products to include an ingredient list, and for other purposes.
Accurate Labeling of Menstrual Products Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

bill.summary:
Accurate Labeling of Menstrual Products Act of 2016
This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require menstrual cups, menstrual pads, tampons, and therapeutic vaginal douche apparatuses to include a list of ingredients on the label.
